transcript: I mean, you can't take those things out of a war. But when you drive that car and you see the new refrigerator, you got to know that it came out of the love that a man can have for another man.

segments.text: I mean, you can't take those things out of a war.
But when you drive that car and you see the new refrigerator,
you got to know that it came out of the love that a man can have for another man.
